title: John Martyn - 1971 - 1980 (LP12 vinyl needledrops)
description:
Bless The Weather (Island  ILPS 9167  1980 pressing Night & Day label)
Grace & Danger (Island ILPS 9560 ORIGINAL PRESSING)
Inside Out (Island ILPS.9253 pink rim original pressing)
One World (original pressing 1977 Island ILPS 9492)
Solid Air (Simply Vinyl SYLP 102)
Sundays Child (Island 9296 1980 pressing Night & Day label)


All tracks sourced from mint UK copies

Cleaned with Knosti machine, LAT International fluid & ionised water.

Dedicated mains supply.

All contacts cleaned with Kontact & treated with Walker Audio Super Silver.

Linn LP12, Lingo, Ekos and Dynavector XX2 moving coil cartridge, LAT International IC 200 Mark II cables, Naim 62 pre-amp into Pioneer PDR-609 CDR, using TDK Audio Pro CD-R.

Declicked in reverse using iZotope RX2 Advanced.
